basics.name: Jane Doe
basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: I am a web developer with expertise in frontend development and exposure to backend development. I design and develop web applications using the latest technologies to deliver quality products.
basics.objective: Eager to expand my skill set through external training to help boost all major front-end KPIs. Hoping to leverage organizational skills to help ABC Corp introduce time-saving schemes for all executives.

work.name: Tech Solutions Ltd.
highlights: Developed a web application for a major client with a team of 5 developers.
work.summary:
• Led the frontend team to develop reusable components, ensuring high-quality code.
  • Reviewed code from other developers and suggested improvements.
  • Collaborated with designers to ensure designs were translated into functional interfaces.
  • Maintained e-commerce platforms using Fastcommerce, a Brazilian e-commerce platform.

work.name: Innovative Tech Co.
highlights: Developed a web application for a major client with a team of 5 developers.
work.summary:
• Developed web applications based on SharePoint, Drupal 8, and Episerver.
  • Led a team of 10 frontend developers, providing support and feedback.
  • Managed tasks and kept stakeholders updated on project progress.
  • Ensured features met requirements through code reviews and quality checks.

work.name: Web Solutions Inc.
highlights: Designed and developed user interfaces for digital platforms of small companies.
work.summary:
• Developed WordPress themes and plugins, providing training for clients.
  • Maintained and customized e-commerce platforms using Magento.
  • Integrated external services such as payment gateways into Magento solutions.

activities.involvements:
• Identified a critical bug in a new shopping cart software release, preventing millions in potential sales tax undercharges.
  • Isolated a pricing tool flaw, leading to a 20% revenue increase through more competitive pricing.
  • Implemented automated testing tools, improving regression and usability testing.
activities.achievements:
• Completed 'React and Redux - A Complete Guide 2020' from Udemy.
  • Earned Agile and Scrum Master Certification from Udacity.
  • Received 'Best Performer' award for consistently exceeding performance goals.
  • Awarded 'Certificate of Exceptional Bug Finder' by XYZ client.
  • Recognized for zero-defect delivery on multiple projects.

volunteer.summary: Organized hackathons and monthly meetups to foster community engagement.
highlights: Awarded 'Volunteer of the Month' for outstanding contributions.

awards.title: Certificate of Best Frontend Developer
awards.summary: Awarded for exceptional improvements made to enhance user experience.
